item.description: Kaisong Huang PhD Student Advised by Dr. Tianzheng Wang Data-Intensive Systems Lab School of Computing Science Simon Fraser University Office: TASC1 9400 Email: kha85@sfu.ca Research Interests My research interests are mainly focused on database engine, transaction processing, and storage management. Publications Kaisong Huang, Darien Imai, Tianzheng Wang, Dong Xie. SSDs Striking Back: The Storage Jungle and Its Implications on Persistent Indexes. Conference on Innovative Data Systems Research (CIDR 2022), January 2022.
